#Patch configure
del "enabled libmp3lame        && require "libmp3lame >= 3.98.3" lame/lame.h lame_set_VBR_quality -lmp3lame $libm_extralibs"
#Patch libmp3lame.c
Add #pragma comment(lib, "lame_mp3.lib")
Replace #include "lame.h"

CALL "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat"

cd /d "C:/msys64"
msys2_shell.cmd -mingw64 -full-path

./configure --enable-libmp3lame --enable-asm --target-os=win64 --arch=x86_64 --enable-nonfree --enable-stripping --disable-doc  --enable-cross-compile --disable-ffplay --disable-ffprobe --disable-shared --enable-static --prefix=${PWD}/installed --toolchain=msvc
